synthesis_conditions.comments: Crystallizes from liquid ammonia containing different bismuthide precursors. The structure compares to the planar zigzag arrangement of Bi4 in K6[Bi4]·8 NH3. The Bi-Bi separations and Bi-Bi-Bi bond angle are provided for comparison with other compounds.

Obtained from liquid ammonia solutions with different precursors in the presence of 18-crown-6. The six-membered Bi6 ring exhibits a chair conformation with specified Bi-Bi separations and bond angles.
